hiveArticle.title: Add Images with Underscore in Busy.org
hiveArticle.body:
When I upload Images in Steemit it creates a path which includes steemitimages.com and then the whole path. For Example : https://steemitimages.com/ + DQmaYauBqmx5z8GiwJTKPpinTQ6ebxetwhJKqakruLEwDQJ/IMG_20170302_105004917.jpg Now if you have an Image which has underscore ("_") in it, busy.org remove that underscore from the URL.So, when you try to copy the URL to busy.org, it looks something like below where the underscore is missing. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509423844/oq6uypcopegt9fooxpx9.png)
Open Source Contribution posted via Utopian.io
